title: Toushinden (Battle Arena Toshinden)
synopsis: For one year, Master Swordsman Eiji Shinjo has been haunted by the memory of his battle with the renegade champion, Gaia - a battle that was cut short by the forces of the malevolent syndicate known as "the organization."
voices: ['Shimada, Bin', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Gouri, Daisuke', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Hikami, Kyouko', 'Nishikawa, Ikuo', 'Tachiki, Fumihiko', 'Ogata, Megumi']
staff: [['Oobari, Masami', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Hikami, Kyouko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nakazawa, Kazuto', ['Character Design', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director']]]
